about_the_game:
Digital version of a board game that doesn't exist.

Skeleton Hotel is a single player survival board game inspired by the Resident Evil and Silent Hill series, with an emphasis on inventory management and replayability.

Rosenberg Productions Inc.
presents



( Starring Detective Whoopsy )

- - -

Synopsis


Skeleton Hotel, the world-famous horror reality show, has already broken every existing viewership record, but with the latest season, the hotel's legendary host, Dr. Manuel Rosenberg, is raising the stakes even further...

- - -

How do I know if Skeleton Hotel is for me?


Skeleton Hotel is for you if:

- You like dice and card-based board games.
- You appreciate compact and fast-paced stories.
- You enjoy single player experiences.
- You love inventory management.
- Replayability is an important factor for you.
- You don't just finish games, but complete them.

- - -

How long is Skeleton Hotel - Season 10?


Main story
1 hour

Main + S Rank
1.5 hours

Completionist
9 hours

- - -

High replayability with tons of unlockables!


- 01 Super compact map
- 25 Unique character cards
- 06 Killer transformations
- 05 Secret encounters
- 03 Game modes
- Gameplay modifiers
- And more!

- - -

Greetings!

I, Dr. Manuel Rosenberg, am pleased to inform you that you have won the lead role in the Skeleton Hotel.

Reveal the mystery of the latest season of our legendary horror reality show and have a chance to win our anniversary grand prize: the fabulous 1,000,000 Hotel Dollars.

Wishing you a pleasant survival and good luck!

With Love,
Manuel

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Compatible up to 10.15.17 Catalina
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 2.0 ghz or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2nd Generation Intel Core HD Graphics (2000/3000), 512MB
  • Storage: 250 MB available space

name: Skeleton Hotel - Season 10

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 2.1 ghz or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2nd Generation Intel Core HD Graphics (2000/3000), 512MB
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 250 MB available space

short_description: Skeleton Hotel is a single player survival board game inspired by the Resident Evil and Silent Hill series, with an emphasis on inventory management and replayability. Featuring 1 compact story mode, more than 20 crazy characters, 6 killer transformations, obtainable S rank, and tons of unlockables.
